main event: A radar target was tracked chasing to the south in Silver Grove, Kentucky on February 7, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 minutes,The object was tracked on ground radar until it was lost,The estimated speed of the object was 1.75 miles per minute,The witness estimated the object's distance from them to be about 4 miles,There were other questions in the report related to the object's appearance and conditions.
witness description: The witness or witnesses are not specified in the document.
